name: Hypostasis
description: Your body continuously struggles to keep up with your new physiology  You occassionally feel less than perfect; unhealthy and in need of remedy.

name: Growing Pangs
description: The molding of perfection was a success, though the clay of the past still remains.  Your body's more vestigial parts occassionally spur minor pain and stimulation within you.  A minor side effect.

name: 20/15 Vision
description: Your eyes are rated at perfect human levels - just like the rest of you.  You gain +1 perception

name: Calm Mind
description: Your mind is clear and directed outwards, and you find it easier to experience the world and raw emotions.  You gain a +1 to your perception.

name: Tranquil Mind
description: Your mind is a deep well of reflective wisdom and tranquility.  You gain a +1 to intelligence and +2 to perception.
